title: Eat Well, Waste Less: An A-Z Guide to Using Up Leftovers
description:
Eat Well, Waste Less: An A-Z Guide to Using Up Leftovers (Green Books Guides) by Bish Muir

English | 2008 | ISBN: 1900322374 | ISBN-13: 9781900322379 | 108 pages | EPUB | 2 MB

Do you have to throw away that single carrot? How can you make that cold chicken tasty? Can you use that yoghurt at the back of the fridge? We all have leftovers, which often get thrown away - the average household puts over GBP500-worth of edible food in the bin every year!

This book: * is packed with ideas for using up your leftovers * gives advice on planning, buying and storing food * will help you reduce your food bills * will help reduce your environmental impact
